item.description:
Hey there folks.  

 

Long time since we got together! Can we make this happen before the holidays whisk out attention completely away from building some wealth in a sea of uncertainty???

 

So the banks are getting their "act" together and foreclosures are on the rise in MA! While it's bad news for many families, it remains good news for investors.  

 

  • So how do we find REO's?
  • Who are the specific people at banks or other institutions who keep the list and check it twice?
  • What does one need to do to qualify for hard or oter money to get one of these choice properties from the Jaws of defeat" at the banks and to our windows of opportunity?

If you, or someone you know, has something to add to this conversation and/or you want to be part of this opportunity, come on down!  

I am looking for any RE professionals to come and share their war stories and perspectives. 

 

Happy Holidays

 

John
item.name: Figure out REO's - how to turn a negative to a positive!
